executionPlan.name: geo_traffic_westminister_alert
executionPlan.queryExpressions:
from dataIn[geo:intersects(geometry, "{'type':'Polygon','coordinates':[[[-0.1297760009765625,51.49915245023299],[-0.1297760009765625,51.502144535807645],[-0.12329578399658203,51.502144535807645],[-0.12329578399658203,51.49915245023299],[-0.1297760009765625,51.49915245023299]]]}")==true] select id, state, concat("Traffic alert in westminister. State: ", state, " ", information) as information, timeStamp, geo:needToNotify(id, concat(information, state), "sendFirst") as notify insert into innerStream;
from innerStream[notify == true] select id, state, information, timeStamp, 0.0 as latitude, 0.0 as longitude insert into dataOut
